Latvia: Bishop Berthold of Hanover arrived at the mouth of the Daugava River accompanied by crusaders and was killed in battle with Livonians.
Belgium: Baldwin VI, Count of Hainaut, donates all his possessions in the village of Horrues to the collegiate church of Soignies to endow a Lady chapel and a chantry.
Armenia: Leon II "the Magnificent" managed to secure his crown, becoming the first King of Armenian Cilicia.
